sourcesContent:
import {rootConstants} from '../_constants';

export const allActions = {
    mapStateToProps,
    mapDispatchToProps
};

function mapStateToProps(state) {
    return {
       lessonData: state.lessonData,
       lessonData1: state.lessonData1,
       counter: state.counter,

       GrapIsLog: state.GrapIsLog,
       GrapRequestIsLog: state.GrapRequestIsLog,
       LessonIsLog: state.LessonIsLog,
       SchoolIsLog: state.SchoolIsLog,


       LessonChooseRequest: state.LessonChooseRequest,
       LessonChooseIsLog: state.LessonChooseIsLog,
       LessonChooseData: state.LessonChooseData,


       graphLessonName: state.graphLessonName,
       graphLessonData: state.graphLessonData,
       schoolName: state.schoolName,
       buttonStateName: state.buttonStateName,
       allLessonData: state.allLessonData,
       example: state.example,


       lessonPlan: state.lessonPlan,
       planRequest: state.planRequest,
       planIslog: state.planIslog,

       beforeNumber:state.beforeNumber,
       beforeNumberColor:state.beforeNumberColor,

       afterNumber:state.afterNumber,

       planLessonData: state.planLessonData,
       planLessonData1: state.planLessonData1,
    }
  }

function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch) {
    return {
        newSchoolName: (datas) => dispatch({type: rootConstants.SCHOOL_NAME , data:datas}),
        newLesson: (data1) => dispatch({type: rootConstants.ROOT_REQUEST , data: data1}),

        chartState: (data1) => dispatch({type: rootConstants.MODAL_REQUEST , data: data1}),
        
        modalTrue: () => dispatch({type: rootConstants.MODAL_GRAP_TRUE }),
        modalFalse: () => dispatch({type: rootConstants.MODAL_GRAP_FALSE }),
        modalRequest: (data) => dispatch({type: rootConstants.MODAL_GRAP_REQUEST, data:data }),

        LessonChooseTrue: () => dispatch({type: rootConstants.LESSON_CHOOSE_TRUE }),
        LessonChooseFalse: () => dispatch({type: rootConstants.LESSON_CHOOSE_FALSE }),
        LessonChooseRequest: (data, name) => dispatch({type: rootConstants.LESSON_CHOOSE_REQUEST, data:data , name: name}),

        modalLessonTrue: () => dispatch({type: rootConstants.MODAL_LESSON_TRUE }),
        modalLessonFalse: (data,data1) => dispatch({type: rootConstants.MODAL_LESSON_FALSE , data:data, data1:data1}),

        modalSchoolTrue: (data) => dispatch({type: rootConstants.MODAL_SCHOOL_TRUE ,data:data}),
        modalSchoolFalse: () => dispatch({type: rootConstants.MODAL_SCHOOL_FALSE }),



        lessonDataPush: (data1) => dispatch({type: rootConstants.LESSONS_DATA_PUSH , data: data1}),
        lessonDataPop: (data1) => dispatch({type: rootConstants.LESSONS_DATA_POP , data: data1}),

        buttonStateControl: (data1) => dispatch({type: rootConstants.BUTTON_STATE , data: data1}),

// Hicheel huvair gargah uyiin tovchnuuud
        lessonPlanRequest: (data) => dispatch({type: rootConstants.LESSON_PLAN_REQUEST , data:data}),
// omnoh hesgin noimrig hadgalah dispatch
        beforeNumberSet: (data, colors) => dispatch({type: rootConstants.BEFORE_NUMBER_SET , data:data, colors:colors}),
        
        afterNumberSet: (data) => dispatch({type: rootConstants.AFTER_NUMBER_SET , data:data}),



        planLessonDataPush: (data1) => dispatch({type: rootConstants.PLAN_LESSONS_DATA_PUSH , data: data1}),
        planLessonDataPop: (data1) => dispatch({type: rootConstants.PLAN_LESSONS_DATA_POP , data: data1}),

    }
}
